document.full_text: connecticut has defeated notre dame three times this season, and when the teams meet sunday, a trip to the n.c.a.a. women's final will be at stake.
document.title: when uconn meets notre dame, the fourth time will be the charm
lines_and_colors: connecticut has defeated notre dame three times this season, and when the teams meet sunday, a trip to the n.c.a.a. women's final will be at stake.
